Explore Desk Models

Life is best when filled with great design. Beyond useful - These design objects give meaning to a space, and a spark to one's emotions. We rarely abide by the rules, but there is one principle to which we will always remain true: form follows function. Design and functionality blends to create one harmonious whole.

Watch the Film

The all-new 2018 models bring second generation Xdesk patent-pending technologies to life. With integrated torage solutions, autonomous movement, new safety features, and superior stability, Xdesk users enjoy more user-centric solutions than ever before.

Bring Yours Home Today

Discover how a truly ergonomic desk will change your life for the better. Xdesk is not only committed to the evolution of the desk, but to that of the person using it. For the first time ever, it's now possible to enjoy the odern lifestyle while rewarding your mind, body and soul.
